title: ハンドバッグ を 返して！

scene.description: Spring meadow full of wildflowers near the Moomin house. A sudden gust scatters flowers and upends Moominmamma's handbag.

sentences.japanese: この 花 が きれい だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: A spring meadow full of wildflowers near the Moomin house. Colorful blooms stretch across the field. Moomintroll walks through them peacefully. A perfect day. Beautiful flower meadow. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Bright warm spring light, peaceful beauty mood.

sentences.japanese: あの ビフ が きた！
sentences.imagePrompt: Suddenly Biff appears at the edge of the meadow, running toward the group. A large angry figure charging through the flowers. The peaceful scene is shattered. Biff running into the meadow. Medium shot, eye-level. Harsh urgent spring light, alarming arrival mood.

sentences.japanese: ハンドバッグ が ない！
sentences.imagePrompt: Moominmamma clutches at empty air where her handbag was. It is gone! A sudden gust scattered everything. She looks around frantically. Moominmamma missing her handbag. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright frantic spring light, panicked loss mood.

sentences.japanese: 「ハンドバッグ を 返して！」 と 言った。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moominmamma calls out forcefully, demanding the handbag be returned. Her normally gentle face is stern and determined. She points at Biff. Moominmamma demanding the handbag back. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright forceful spring light, demanding mood.

sentences.japanese: ビフ が 追った。
sentences.imagePrompt: Biff chases Thingumy across the flower meadow. Flowers scatter in their wake. The chase sends petals flying into the air. Running figures among the flowers. Biff chasing through the meadow. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Dynamic spring chase light, pursuit mood.

sentences.japanese: 追う の は ひどい！
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll watches the chase with disapproval. Chasing someone is terrible! He clenches his fists in frustration at the unfairness. Moomintroll disapproving of the chase. Medium shot, eye-level. Harsh judgmental spring light, moral outrage mood.

sentences.japanese: ひどい こと だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Sniff shakes his head in dismay. This is a terrible thing happening in their peaceful meadow. The chase continues in the background. Sniff shaking his head. Medium shot, eye-level. Troubled spring light, dismayed commentary mood.

sentences.japanese: 他 の もの は？
sentences.imagePrompt: Moominmamma checks around for her other belongings scattered by the wind. What about the other things? She kneels among the flowers searching. Moominmamma searching for scattered items. Medium shot, slightly elevated. Bright searching spring light, worried inventory mood.

sentences.japanese: 花 の なか に ある。
sentences.imagePrompt: Various objects from the handbag lie scattered among the wildflowers. A compact mirror, a handkerchief, and other items peek out between blooms. Objects among the flowers. Medium close-up, slightly elevated. Bright detailed spring light, hidden-in-flowers discovery mood.

sentences.japanese: コレクション が ある。
sentences.imagePrompt: Inside the open handbag on the ground, a collection of precious items is visible — shells, pressed flowers, small mementos. A lifetime of collected treasures. Collection visible inside the handbag. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm revealing spring light, treasure reveal mood.

sentences.japanese: ハンドバッグ の なか に コレクション が ある。
sentences.imagePrompt: Close view of the handbag's contents — Moominmamma's personal collection of precious keepsakes arranged inside. She points at them, explaining their importance. Moominmamma showing her collection. Medium close-up, eye-level. Warm precious spring light, sentimental value mood.

sentences.japanese: 「返す こと が 必要 だ」 と 言った。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moomintroll speaks firmly to Biff, explaining that returning what was taken is necessary. He stands between Biff and the others, arms crossed. Moomintroll confronting Biff firmly. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright resolute spring light, firm moral stance mood.

sentences.japanese: えっ 他 に なに が ある？
sentences.imagePrompt: Everyone searches the meadow for other scattered items. What else is out there? They spread out among the flowers, eyes scanning the ground. Group searching the meadow. Medium-wide shot, slightly elevated. Bright searching spring light, thorough search mood.

sentences.japanese: 追う の は だめ だ。
sentences.imagePrompt: Snufkin stands with crossed arms, blocking Biff's path. Chasing is not acceptable. His calm but firm stance contrasts with Biff's aggression. Snufkin blocking Biff's path. Medium shot, eye-level. Firm spring light, moral authority mood.

sentences.japanese: ビフ は ひどい。
sentences.imagePrompt: Biff stands sheepishly as the group glares at him. He is terrible for what he did. His shoulders droop under their collective disapproval. Biff standing sheepishly. Medium shot, eye-level. Harsh judging spring light, shamed mood.

sentences.japanese: 他 の ひと に 返す。
sentences.imagePrompt: Biff reluctantly hands items back to each person. He returns things to others. His large hands carefully pass delicate objects. Biff returning items. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm resolving spring light, reluctant restitution mood.

sentences.japanese: コレクション を みせて。
sentences.imagePrompt: Moominmamma opens the handbag and shows her collection to everyone now that it is recovered. She beams with relief. The precious items sparkle in the spring light. Moominmamma showing her collection happily. Medium shot, eye-level. Warm proud spring light, recovered treasure display mood.

sentences.japanese: 花 を みる の が 楽しい ね。
sentences.imagePrompt: The meadow is peaceful again. Everyone sits among the flowers, enjoying watching them sway in the gentle breeze. Looking at flowers is fun. Watching flowers is a pleasure. Group sitting in the flower meadow. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Warm peaceful spring light, restored enjoyment mood.

sentences.japanese: 返して！
sentences.imagePrompt: Sniff chases a butterfly that took a flower petal, comically echoing the return theme. Give it back! A lighthearted moment after the drama. Sniff chasing a butterfly playfully. Medium shot, eye-level. Bright playful spring light, comic relief mood.

sentences.japanese: 追って きた。
sentences.imagePrompt: Biff stands at the edge of the meadow facing the group, head bowed in shame. The group watches him with crossed arms. He came chasing but now he is the one defeated. Ironic reversal. Biff facing the group, dejected. Medium-wide shot, eye-level. Soft fading spring light, ironic defeat mood.
